thread.section_title: Paypal Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Paypal | www.paypal.com
thread.title: customer

author: customer
title: customer
text: I feel cheated, not trusted and being used. The decision to hold monies, when I have held an account for several years with this Company, just does not make sense or feel right. I also feel that fees at Paypal are on the high side and I would like better service due to this. I am sure that my money will eventtually arrive in my bank account but my score for Paypal customer service is zero.
